div.l: Wyth kep kep / stand stand stand Iossa ware þe rere
Ga whystele thow ⁊and I schal kepe hȳmm here
But schortly til þᵗat it was veray nyght
They coude not Thow they don al here myȝt
Here capil cache he ran al wey so faste
Tyl in a dych þey caughte hȳm at þe laste
Wery ⁊and wet as beste is in þe reyn
Comyth sely ion ⁊and with hȳm comyth aleyn
Allas ꝙquod Iohn þe day þᵗat I was born
Now are we dreuyn tyl hethng ⁊and to scorn
Oure corn is stole men wele vs folys calle
Boþe þe wardayn ⁊and oure felas alle
And namely þe mellere weyleawey
Thus pleynyth Iohn as he goth be þe wey
Toward þe melle / ⁊and bayard in hese hond
The mellere sittȳnge by þe fyr he fond
For it was nyȝt ⁊and ferþ̉ere myȝte þey nought
But for þe loue of god þey hȳm be sought
Of herberwe ⁊and of ese for here peny
The mellere seyde a geyn ȝif þ̉ere be eny
Swich as it is ȝit schal ȝe haue ȝoᵘure part
Myn hous is streyt but ȝe hān lernede art
Ȝe cūnne wᵗith argumēntis make a place
A myle brod of twēnty fote of space
Let se now ȝif þis space may suffyse
Or make it roūm with speche as is ȝoᵘure gyse
Now symond seyde Iohn be seynt Cutbert
Ay art þᵘou merye ⁊and þis is fayre answeryd
I haue herd seyd men schal tan of too thȳngis
Swich as he fynd or take swich as he brȳngis
But specially I preye þe hoot ⁊and ⁊and deere
Gete vs sūm mete ⁊and drynk ⁊and make vs chere
And we wele paye trewely at þe foullefullefolle
With emty hand mēn may none haukys tolle
Lo here oure syluyr / redy for to spēnde
This mellere in to þe toıı̄unne hese doughtyr sende
